description:
*Updated December 9th 2025**
Manage your Microsoft 365 services effortlessly. Create and manage distribution lists, security groups, and user settings with ease, ensuring streamlined operations and enhanced collaboration. Automate offboarding processes to maintain security and compliance effortlessly.

msClientId.description: Application (Client) ID - Found in Azure Portal > App Registration > Overview

msTenantId.description: Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) Tenant ID - Found in Azure Portal > Entra ID > Overview

msRedirectUri.description: OAuth Redirect URI for user-delegated auth (default: http://localhost:3000/auth/callback)

msClientSecret.description: Client Secret Value - Created in Azure Portal > App Registration > Certificates & secrets

capabilities.name: manage_distribution_lists
capabilities.description: Manage Exchange distribution lists including creation, updates, member management, and settings configuration.

capabilities.name: manage_security_groups
capabilities.description: Manage Azure AD security groups for access control, including group creation, membership, and security settings.

capabilities.name: manage_m365_groups
capabilities.description: Manage Microsoft 365 groups for team collaboration with shared resources like mailbox, calendar, and files.

capabilities.name: manage_exchange_settings
capabilities.description: Manage Exchange Online settings including mailbox configuration, transport rules, and organization policies.

capabilities.name: manage_user_settings
capabilities.description: Manage user account settings including profile information, mailbox settings, licenses, and authentication methods.

capabilities.name: manage_offboarding
capabilities.description: Automate user offboarding processes including account disablement, license removal, data backup, and access revocation.

capabilities.name: manage_sharepoint_sites
capabilities.description: Manage SharePoint sites including creation, configuration, permissions, and site collection administration.

capabilities.name: manage_sharepoint_lists
capabilities.description: Manage SharePoint lists and libraries including schema definition, items, views, and permissions.

capabilities.name: manage_azure_ad_roles
capabilities.description: Manage Azure AD administrative roles including role assignments, custom roles, and privilege escalation controls.

capabilities.name: manage_azure_ad_apps
capabilities.description: Manage Azure AD application registrations including app permissions, credentials, and OAuth configurations.

capabilities.name: manage_azure_ad_devices
capabilities.description: Manage devices registered in Azure AD including device compliance, BitLocker keys, and device actions.

capabilities.name: manage_service_principals
capabilities.description: Manage service principals for application access including permissions, credentials, and enterprise applications.

capabilities.name: call_microsoft_api
capabilities.description: Make direct calls to any Microsoft Graph or Azure Resource Management API endpoint with full control over HTTP methods and parameters.

capabilities.name: search_audit_log
capabilities.description: Search and analyze Azure AD unified audit logs for security events, user activities, and compliance monitoring.

capabilities.name: manage_alerts
capabilities.description: Manage security alerts from Microsoft Defender and other security products including investigation and remediation.

capabilities.name: manage_dlp_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Data Loss Prevention policies to protect sensitive data across Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams.

capabilities.name: manage_dlp_incidents
capabilities.description: Investigate and manage DLP policy violations and incidents including user notifications and remediation actions.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_macos_devices
capabilities.description: Manage macOS devices in Intune including enrollment, compliance policies, device actions, and inventory management.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_macos_policies
capabilities.description: Manage macOS configuration profiles and compliance policies for device security and management settings.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_macos_apps
capabilities.description: Manage macOS application deployment including app assignments, updates, and installation requirements.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_macos_compliance
capabilities.description: Assess macOS device compliance status and generate reports on policy adherence and security posture.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_windows_devices
capabilities.description: Manage Windows devices in Intune including enrollment, autopilot deployment, device actions, and health monitoring.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_windows_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Windows configuration profiles and compliance policies including security baselines and update rings.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_windows_apps
capabilities.description: Manage Windows application deployment including Win32 apps, Microsoft Store apps, and Office 365 assignments.

capabilities.name: manage_intune_windows_compliance
capabilities.description: Assess Windows device compliance status including BitLocker encryption, antivirus status, and security configurations.

capabilities.name: manage_compliance_frameworks
capabilities.description: Manage compliance frameworks and standards including HIPAA, GDPR, SOX, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, and NIST configurations.

capabilities.name: manage_compliance_assessments
capabilities.description: Conduct compliance assessments and generate detailed reports on regulatory adherence and security controls.

capabilities.name: manage_compliance_monitoring
capabilities.description: Monitor ongoing compliance status with real-time alerts for policy violations and regulatory changes.

capabilities.name: manage_evidence_collection
capabilities.description: Collect and preserve compliance evidence including audit logs, configuration snapshots, and attestation records.

capabilities.name: manage_gap_analysis
capabilities.description: Perform gap analysis to identify compliance deficiencies and generate remediation recommendations.

capabilities.name: generate_audit_reports
capabilities.description: Generate comprehensive audit reports for compliance frameworks with evidence documentation and findings.

capabilities.name: manage_cis_compliance
capabilities.description: Manage CIS (Center for Internet Security) benchmark compliance including assessment and remediation tracking.

capabilities.name: manage_retention_policies
capabilities.description: Manage retention policies for content across Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams with lifecycle rules.

capabilities.name: manage_sensitivity_labels
capabilities.description: Manage sensitivity labels for information protection including encryption, content marking, and classification policies.

capabilities.name: manage_information_protection_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Azure Information Protection policies for data classification, encryption, and rights management.

capabilities.name: manage_conditional_access_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Azure AD conditional access policies for zero-trust security including MFA, device compliance, and location-based controls.

capabilities.name: backup_policies
capabilities.description: Export Microsoft 365 policies to JSON format for backup, disaster recovery, and migration. Supports Conditional Access, Named Locations, Authentication Strengths, Intune policies, and more.

capabilities.name: manage_named_locations
capabilities.description: Manage Conditional Access named locations including IP address ranges and country/region locations for location-based access control.

capabilities.name: manage_authentication_strengths
capabilities.description: View and manage authentication strength policies that define which authentication methods satisfy MFA requirements in Conditional Access.

capabilities.name: manage_cross_tenant_access
capabilities.description: Manage cross-tenant access settings for B2B collaboration, including inbound/outbound trust settings and partner configurations.

capabilities.name: manage_identity_protection
capabilities.description: Monitor and manage Azure AD Identity Protection including risk detections, risky users, and risk remediation actions.

capabilities.name: manage_defender_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Microsoft Defender for Office 365 policies including Safe Attachments, Safe Links, anti-phishing, and anti-malware.

capabilities.name: manage_teams_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Microsoft Teams policies for messaging, meetings, calling, apps, and live events across the organization.

capabilities.name: manage_exchange_policies
capabilities.description: Manage Exchange Online policies including mail flow rules, mobile device access, and organization-wide settings.

capabilities.name: manage_sharepoint_governance_policies
capabilities.description: Manage SharePoint governance policies including sharing controls, access restrictions, and site lifecycle management.

capabilities.name: manage_security_alert_policies
capabilities.description: Manage security alert policies for monitoring threats, suspicious activities, and compliance violations across Microsoft 365.

capabilities.name: generate_powerpoint_presentation
capabilities.description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations with custom slides, charts, tables, and themes from Microsoft 365 data.

capabilities.name: generate_word_document
capabilities.description: Create professional Word documents with formatted sections, tables, charts, and table of contents from analysis data.

capabilities.name: generate_html_report
capabilities.description: Create interactive HTML reports and dashboards with responsive design, charts, and filtering capabilities.

capabilities.name: generate_professional_report
capabilities.description: Generate comprehensive professional reports in multiple formats (PowerPoint, Word, HTML, PDF) from Microsoft 365 data.

capabilities.name: oauth_authorize
capabilities.description: Manage OAuth 2.0 authorization for user-delegated access to OneDrive and SharePoint files with secure token handling.

capabilities.name: execute_graph_batch
capabilities.description: Execute multiple Microsoft Graph API requests in a single batch operation for improved performance and efficiency.

capabilities.name: execute_delta_query
capabilities.description: Track incremental changes to Microsoft Graph resources using delta queries for efficient synchronization.

capabilities.name: manage_graph_subscriptions
capabilities.description: Manage webhook subscriptions for real-time change notifications from Microsoft Graph resources.

capabilities.name: execute_graph_search
capabilities.description: Execute advanced search queries across Microsoft 365 content including emails, files, messages, and calendar events.
